snippet: The architect trains his exacting eye on his own cozy, light-filled apartment....
abstract: Steven Kurutz My Space column visits Lower Manhattan apartment of architect Reinaldo Leandro; notes high-ceiling, light-filled residence features modern decor and is filled with books, artwork and other inspirational furnishings.
lead_paragraph: The architect trains his exacting eye on his own cozy, light-filled apartment.

headline.main: A Tour of the Architect Reinaldo Leandro’s Manhattan Living Room
